name: Angry Karen's Mountain Bike adventure [Demo]
description:
Game file.Zip - PC/Windows game file

[Mobile] Angry Karen's Mountain bike adventure - Demo - Mobile game file

Don't Bump the Karen's head or else she will be angry >:(!

The Karen just bought a new mountain bike! She is testing her new bike but one problem she doesn't know how to ride a bike help her drive her new bike!

Can you make it in 30 secs only?

Desktop Controls:

Up to pedal forward, Down to pedal back, Space to brake, Left/Right to rotate

Esc to reset scene.  Try to avoid big jumps as you will fall off the bike!

Want to try the game on mac OS or Linux? Play it online here!

https://games.gdevelop-app.com/game-6aa500cf-f158-4781-bc63-9cf554f3208d/index.h... note this is available few days only!

-This game will be released on Google play soon-
